nodes.text: Majordomo was a droid owned by Iaclyn Stark.

In 3 BBY, Iaclyn used Majordomo to spy on her sister and the Imperial agent Jahan Cross. When the droid informed him that Elli and Cross had accessed his room at the Stark Compound and were breaking into his personal files, he ordered it to immobilize his sister and kill the Imperial agent. The droid attacked, knocking Elli to the ground, but was eventually destroyed by Cross.
